text: Ernest Dale Tubb (February 9, 1914 â€“ September 6, 1984) was an American country music singer and songwriter. Tubb was nicknamed The Texas Troubadour. He is probably best known for his hit song "Walking the Floor Over You" in 1941. He joined the Grand Ole Opry as a member in 1943. He was inducted into the Country Music Hall of Fame in 1965. == Other websites == *Ernest Tubb at the Country Music Hall of Fame Category:1914 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Singers from Texas Category:American guitarists Category:Musicians from Texas Category:Country musicians Category:American Grammy Award winners
title: Ernest Tubb
